job_title: Senior Data Analyst  (Get a 30% salary increase & Pay 0% Tax in Dubai)
job_description:
Puffy is one of America’s fastest-growing e-commerce retailers. Our award-winning mattresses are developed with unrivaled attention to detail and are loved by millions of sleepers in America and Canada.

Since entering the bed-in-a-box market in 2016, we have experienced consistent and considerable year-on-year growth. Driven by a mission to make optimal sleep health a priority for all, we’ve made headlines on Entrepreneur.com and TechCompanyNews, to name a few. Puffy’s product range now extends to the entire bedroom, including pillows, bedding, and bedroom accessories.

We are looking for an experienced Analytics professional to join our growing E-commerce team as a Senior Web Analyst. In this role, you will transform all e-commerce data and translate business and financial goals into agile, insightful analytics that drive actions. You will provide insights across digital advertising campaigns and traffic acquisition, and you will have the opportunity to work closely with our management to develop our digital marketing and E-commerce strategies.

What you will do:
• Performing deep-dive analyses of digital campaigns and developing an understanding of the business’s commercial goals
• Aggregating data from multiple sources, creating reliable databases/data systems & identifying and filling knowledge gaps
• Work closely with Analytics and Digital Marketing teams to produce dashboards in order to tell the narrative of performance across the digital landscape
• Design, execute, and analyze A/B tests to optimize various aspects of our e-commerce website, including but not limited to product pages, landing pages, and user flows.
• Develop a deep understanding of customer behavior and preferences through the analysis of on-site data, user feedback, and customer journey mapping.
• Use analytical tools such as Google Analytics, Adobe Analytics, and other BI tools to generate actionable insights and recommendations.
• Collaborate with cross-functional teams to implement data-driven changes to improve website performance, conversions, and overall customer satisfaction.
• Continuously monitor and analyze site performance metrics, and report on KPIs to inform decision-making and measure the effectiveness of A/B tests and other initiatives.
• Identify new opportunities for A/B testing and on-site data analysis, and contribute to the development of best practices for testing and optimization.
• Stay up-to-date with industry trends and best practices in e-commerce analytics and A/B testing to ensure our organization remains competitive and data-driven.

Ideally you will have:
• Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Engineering, Math, Finance, Accounting, Economics, Statistics, or equivalent work experience.
• At least 5+ years of experience, preferably in E-commerce
• Strong commercial experience working with Google Analytics, Google Big Query, Google Tag Manager, or GA4.
• Fluency in SQL is necessary
• Experience designing, executing, and analyzing A/B tests.
• Proficiency in analytical data manipulation on large marketing databases and external data sources
• Expert using Excel for data analysis and modelling
• Able to adapt to a fast-paced and changing environment
• Extraordinarily strong diligence

Puffy Perks
• "We challenge the status quo." Work with dynamic and supportive colleagues. The leadership team are highly entrepreneurial, it reflects. Ideas, challenges, think tanks, it is all in your day to day.
• Not in Dubai yet? We will cover your visa requirements and help you settle with flights and temporary accommodation (2-week hotel stay).
• Flights home once per year.
• A modern and stylish open plan office in the heart of Dubai Marina. Dozens of restaurants, cafes, supermarkets and shopping within a 5 min walk! Ps. Don't worry we have free company parking.
• We promote a healthy lifestyle! On top of world class health insurance (dental & vision included), our kitchen is stocked with organic snacks, juices, fruits, tea & coffee.
• Top tier tech stack. We are creative and modern. G suite, Atlassian, Re-tool, Asana, Slack. Need something more? Ask away.
• The best equipment, whatever helps you get your work done. Choose your own laptop, monitor (we prefer curved Samsung screens;)), Super ergo office chairs, and whatever else you need.
• Closing the week with a delicious catered lunch on Friday.
